# The `AddrSpaceCastInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class represents a conversion between pointers from one address space to another. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::AddrSpaceCastInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class represents a conversion between pointers from one address space to another.
